    new(code_object, name = nil, scope = nil, visibility = nil, closure = nil, spec = nil) click to toggle source

    # File lib/solargraph/pin/yard_pin/method.rb, line 8
def initialize code_object, name = nil, scope = nil, visibility = nil, closure = nil, spec = nil
  @code_object = code_object
  @spec = spec
  closure ||= Solargraph::Pin::Namespace.new(
    name: code_object.namespace.to_s,
    gates: [code_object.namespace.to_s]
  )
  super(
    location: location,
    closure: closure,
    name: name || code_object.name.to_s,
    comments: nil,
    scope: scope || code_object.scope,
    visibility: visibility || code_object.visibility,
    args: nil
  )
end

    # File lib/solargraph/pin/yard_pin/method.rb, line 26
def parameters
  @parameters ||= get_parameters(code_object)
end

    Private Instance Methods

    get_parameters(code_object) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/solargraph/pin/yard_pin/method.rb, line 32
def get_parameters code_object
  return [] unless code_object.is_a?(YARD::CodeObjects::MethodObject)
  args = []
  code_object.parameters.each do |a|
    p = a[0]
    unless a[1].nil?
      p += ' =' unless p.end_with?(':')
      p += " #{a[1]}"
    end
    args.push p
  end
  args
end
